credentialSubject.statement: Seven students from Yangon’s Dagon University are believed to have been abducted by the military

incidentClaim.narrative: On April 21, five of the students disappeared after one revealed in a phone call with Dagon University Student Union chairperson Min Htet Han that a military truck was entering their street in Bahan Township.  The students were identified as Khant Zin Win, Thura Maung Maung, Zaw Lin Naing, Thiha Htet Zaw and Hein Htet.
The next day, two of their colleagues—Thet Paing Oo and Khant Lin Maung Maung—also reportedly went missing.
